New Records: Luka Modric scored a goal in the 52nd minute with an expertly executed free kick from the edge of the box, securing a 1-0 win for Croatia over Poland
Key Match Events: Croatia pressed from the start but the game was goalless at the break
Poland barely threatened Croatia's box for the majority of the game
Strikers Igor Matanovic and Robert Lewandowski hit the bar for Croatia and Poland respectively later in the second half
Pre-Game Insights: Croatia was beaten 2-1 by Portugal in their Nations League opener on Thursday
Post-Match Reflections: Portugal tops the group with six points ahead of second-placed Croatia and Poland in third, both with three points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The visitors barely threatened Croatia's box for the majority of the game
Home goalkeeper Dominik Livakovic only had to intervene following halftime to deny Nicola Zalewski from Poland's first attempt on goal
